notes: Double clicking the item automatically casts it on your team's fountain, blinking towards its direction, using the penalty distance.
Does not blink for the full distance when targeting closer than the max distance.
When targeting beyond the max blink distance, it blinks for 960 range towards the targeted direction, instead of 1200.
The second sound only plays when the blinked distance is greater than 960. It is audible to everyone.

Damage greater than 0 from any player (including allies, excluding self) or Roshan puts Blink on a 3 second cooldown. Since it is a cooldown and not actually disabled, it can be refreshed with Refresher Orb, Refresher Shard and Rearm. However, this cooldown is not affected by Octarine Core or Arcane Rune. Does not get disabled by damage flagged as HP Removal.
Since it is a cooldown and not actually disabled, it can be refreshed with Refresher Orb, Refresher Shard and Rearm.
However, this cooldown is not affected by Octarine Core or Arcane Rune.
Does not get disabled by damage flagged as HP Removal.
Does not share cooldown with Fallen Sky.
abilities.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. After teleporting , you gain 30% movement speed, + 40 Attack Speed, and 40 Attack Damage for 6 seconds. Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Swift Blink
description: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.
